title: Rinin ram nuam a awm ka hria a
lyrics:
Rinin ram nuam a awm ka hria a,
A ropuizia sawi hleih theih loh chu;
Chatuan in mawi, ni aia engah,
Isua nen chuta awm ka chak hle.

Chuta awm, chuta awm,
Isua nen chuta awm ka chak hle;
Chuta awm, chuta awm,
Isua nen chuta awm ka chak hle.

Pathian lehkhabu thu ka chhiarin,
Malsawmsakna hmuin ka lawm a;
Chutah riltam, tuihal a reh ang,
Chumi ramah chaute an chawl ang.

Vanram nawmzia tu nge sawi thei ang?
Thlaphan te, lungngaih te a bo vang;
Mitthi ngaih te, tah te, nat te nen,
Thih leh pawh a awm tawh hauh lo vang.

Chu mi ram nuamah chuan awm turin,
Pathianin mi sualte a sawm a;
Tu pawh a sawmna ngaisangte chu,
Chumi ram nuamah chuan an cheng ang.
